vision.notes: Vision capabilities in Scissurellidae are unknown based on the provided context.

chemoreception.notes: As marine gastropods, Scissurellidae likely use chemoreception to detect food and other chemicals in the water. This is inferred from the general biology of marine snails.

mechanoreception.notes: As marine gastropods, Scissurellidae likely use mechanoreception to sense their environment, including water currents, substrate vibrations, and physical contact. This is inferred from the general biology of marine snails.
